example.name: transitive
example.text: What hope [*T*-1] lay in the nephews , she asked the intensifying light out there [*T*-2] , with one married to a barren woman and [the other]-1 divorced [*] , [*]-1 having sired two girl children , with none [0] [*T*-3] to bear on the Packard name ? ?
